name: HysterectomyWithNoResidualCervix_HD_Grouping
title: Hysterectomy With No Residual Cervix_HD_Grouping
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Hysterectomy With No Residual Cervix.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need for Hysterectomy With No Residual Cervix and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Data Element Scope: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need for Hysterectomy With No Residual Cervix and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need for Hysterectomy With No Residual Cervix and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need for Hysterectomy With No Residual Cervix and utilization in patients/users connected health.)
